00014 #include <string>
00015 
00016 class FunctionParameterBase {
00017     public:
00018         FunctionParameterBase(const std::string &_description = ""):
00019             description(_description) { }
00020 
00021         const std::string &getDescription() const { return description; }
00022         void setDescription(const std::string &_description) {
00023             description = _description;
00024         }
00026 
00029         virtual operator double() { return 0.;};
00030 
00031     private:
00032         std::string description;
00033 };
00034 
00035 template <typename T> class FunctionParameter: public FunctionParameterBase {
00036     public:
00037         FunctionParameter<T>(const T &_defaultValue, const T &_value = 0.0,
00038                              const std::string &_description = ""):
00039                 FunctionParameterBase(_description),
00040                 defaultValue(_defaultValue), value(_value) {
00041                     if (!value) value = defaultValue;
00042                 }
00043 
00044         virtual const T &getValue() const { return value; }
00045         virtual void setValue(const T &_value) { value = _value; }
00046         virtual const T &getDefaultValue() const { return defaultValue; }
00047         virtual void setDefaultValue(const T &_defaultValue) {
00048             defaultValue = _defaultValue;
00049         }
00050         virtual operator double() { return (double)value; }
00051 
00052     private:
00053         T defaultValue;
00054         T value;
00055 };
